chantey.title: Paddy, Come Work On the Railway
chantey.text: In eighteen hundred and sixty three, I came across the stormy sea, My dung'ree breeches I put on, To work upon the railway, the railway, To work upon the railway, Oh, poor Paddy, come work on the railway.
